void dropChopsticks ( int  id  ) 

Handles unlocking of mutexs and simulates dropping them back on the table.

Handles unlocking of mutexs and simulates dropping them back on the table. Does this in and Odd-Even fashion to ensure deadlock and starvation prevention.
